short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our tool grades listings by category standards, offering data-driven insights for effective improvement.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take your optimization game to the next level with our handy browser extension, designed just for Amazon sellers like you. Whenever you’re on an Amazon product description page, our extension instantly shows you a listing text score out of 10 for that specific ASIN. This score is based on real data from your product category, helping you quickly see how well your listing stacks up against best practices and industry standards.
What’s even better? You can check the listing scores not just for your own ASINs but also for your competitors’ listings! This feature gives you valuable insights into how others in your niche are performing, allowing you to spot opportunities to get ahead.
We grade your listings using an easy-to-follow 11-point checklist that covers key aspects. This thorough evaluation helps you identify what’s working well and where you can make improvements, making it easier than ever to boost your listing’s performance.
But we don’t just stop at scoring. Our extension offers personalized recommendations to enhance your listings. You’ll get practical tips on optimizing product descriptions, improving images, all aimed at improving your Amazon ranking and attracting more buyers.
And the best part? It’s completely free! Just log in on MySellerCentral account to unlock these powerful features and start transforming your Amazon presence today. Whether you’re a seasoned seller or just starting out, our extension is a must-have tool in your toolkit.
Maximize your selling potential with MySellerCentral, where data-driven insights meet practical solutions for Amazon sellers! Join our community of successful sellers and take the guesswork out of listing optimization. With our tools, you’re not just selling products; you’re building a brand that stands out in the busy Amazon marketplace.
